wimbledon.title: luxury
wimbledon.subtitle: bespoke since 2012
wimbledon.aboutDescription: On the road to La Marsa, here is a sublime luxury men's ready-to-wear workshop that has existed since 2012. Custom-tailored suits, shirts, polos and even a perfume. A British style sublimating carefully chosen raw materials and worked with passion. A universe filled with sensuality and non-conformist freedom, a very chic lifestyle! Absolutely to discover.
wimbledon.summerSubtitle1: Created for excellence in every detail,
wimbledon.summerSubtitle2: our tailored pieces embody traditional craftsmanship
